about.name: George R. Muthike
about.bio: Passionate and results-oriented Web Designer and Developer with 3+ years of experience delivering premium, user-centered websites and applications. Based in Nairobi, Kenya, George specializes in scalable, responsive, and visually appealing digital solutions.

technical: Machine Learning: scikit-learn, pandas, NumPy, seaborn, matplotlib
professional: Data Analysis with SQL, Python (pandas), and Excel

desc: Designed and deployed responsive websites tailored to client needs.
Optimized performance, reducing load times by 30%.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions.
Conducted analysis using Python and SQL, identifying critical trends.
Improved efficiency of reporting processes by 25%.

education.desc: Advanced training in research and analytical writing.
Designed and deployed websites with strong focus on responsiveness and optimization.

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.desc: Personal portfolio showcasing skills, projects, and blog.

projects.name: STEM Education Website
projects.desc: A site for inspiring students through STEM education.

projects.name: Expense Tracker App
projects.desc: Tracks daily expenses with charts and visual summaries.
